subsc: Agricultural extension and research,Roads and highways,Central government administration,Irrigation and drainage

abstracts.cdata!:
The Small Scale Irrigation Project will
            build upon and expand the Small Scale Irrigation Pilot
            Programme established under the Irrigation Rehabilitation II
            project and the Government's own program initiated in
            the mid-1980s. The project will provide supplementary
            irrigation for about 43,000 farmers over a six-year period
            by establishing about 850 small irrigation schemes. The
            project will consist of the following components: a)
            off-farm irrigation infrastructure; b) on-farm investments
            c) technology transfer; d) institutional development; e)
            environmental protection and f) La Mojana Pilot project (
            for pilot agricultural development in a large but
            environmentally fragile drainage area of great economic
            potential )
